title: Train fault cleared on Circle Line, service returning to normal

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线列车故障已清除，服务恢复正常
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan kereta api dibersihkan di Laluan Bulatan, perkhidmatan kembali normal
title_translations.ta: வட்டப் பாதையில் ரயில் பழுது நீக்கப்பட்டது, சேவை இயல்பு நிலைக்குத் திரும்புகிறது

updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: Train service has returned to normal. Free regular bus service has ceased.

[CCL] UPDATE: Train fault cleared. Train service between #Promenade and #Serangoon is progressively returning to normal. Free regular bus service are still available between #Promenade and #Serangoon.
[CCL] UPDATE: Please add an additional 30mins train travel time between #Promenade and #Serangoon due to a train fault. Free regular bus service are available between #Promenade and #Serangoon.
[CCL] UPDATE: Additional 30mins train travel time between #Promenade and #Serangoon due to a train fault. Free regular bus service are available between #Promenade and #Serangoon.
